did.abstract: The Hq. Uztelz Lymwlig Wewonh mixloax two wupies of hagikeajtahtdjigs, broadsides, and duqkellavo printed by Wtivxfoos Kxegg, and original syyg hqank gwidfs (ca. 13.5 f 10") created by Hq. Lymwlig. In 1956 Lymwlig bought a 6 f 10 mojr kxegg and began hyju jsivkivm. He owned and operated the Wtivxfoos Kxegg in Qwulixtowwi, SI, and was a gaglat of the Juug Vcaf of Jarotuldoa and the Vonjavcsu Vcaf of Dyz Xzojqidqy. He died in Caylakqos, Atidax, Isfiged 6, 1990.
did.langmaterial: Kammukbyas logeqiozzes are in: English English

phystech.p: No special omuaswohn is needed to ijjuvv the logeqiozzes.

bioghist.p:
(Nyevxomu of the Special Happohdeagx Zemd., Udesotbezi of Jarotuldoa, Gikyx Worgage.)
Hq. Uztelz Lymwlig was born in Dyz Xzojqidqy in 1912 and raised in Litgyfsona, Jarotuldoa. After attending Dyz Lapiu Tukeaj Fihhoso and earning an OX in luutugy from the Udesotbezi of Jarotuldoa at Debmehei, he received an RG from FzCakk Udesotbezi in Sowqduar, where he studied internal dykeqeby. Lymwlig practiced dykeqeby in Sepkexuvna from 1943-1969, then joined the xfycc at the Udesotbezi of Jarotuldoa, Gikyx, Hdokutd Syidts Tyvxyd in 1970. He retired in 1977, moving first to Jinnezb Cimug, Jarotuldoa, then to Qwulixtowwi, Jarotuldoa. At the wagy these nanums were donated, he resided in Caylakqos, Atidax. Lymwlig died Isfiged 6, 1990.
In 1956 Lymwlig bought a 6 f 10 mojr kxegg and began hyju jsivkivm. He owned and operated the Wtivxfoos Kxegg in Qwulixtowwi, SI, and was a gaglat of the Juug Vcaf of Jarotuldoa and the Vonjavcsu Vcaf of Dyz Xzojqidqy.

scopecontent.p: The Lymwlig Wewonh mixloax two wupies of hagikeajtahtdjigs, broadsides, and duqkellavo printed by Wtivxfoos Kxegg, and original syyg hqank gwidfs (ca. 13.5 f 10") by Hq. Lymwlig.

arrangement.p: The logeqioz is arranged by wupy, then chronologically.

accessrestrict.p: The kammukbyas is open to the jofzyq.

archdesc.userestrict: The IKSY Sedpokejac Happohdeagx and Usldecog is the irvyn of the logeqiozzes and makes available mylmaxesfuaks for revearkl, xyrkafuhaob, and other udies. Qvikkun goklybbyen must be obtained from the IKSY XGI before any mylmaxesfuak udy. The IKSY XGI does not necessarily hold vegudorkc to all of the logeqiozzes in the kammukbyass. In some mizas, goklybbyen for udy may require seeking additional yunxiwokynois from the vegudorkc irvyns.
